user_exist_error: This user account already exists. Please log in!
status_accepted_desc:
Your request has been successfully approved
To receive the loan, please come to the “Halk Bank” branch with all necessary documents
You can find the necessary documents in the Loan section of the program
For more information, you can contact the following numbers (09:00 - 18:00)
(99312) 44-48-37
(99312) 22-73-23
status_declined_desc:
Sorry, we couldn't approve your request at the moment
For more information, you can contact the following numbers (09:00 - 18:00)
(99312) 44-48-37
(99312) 22-73-23
Or come to the “Halk Bank” branch nearest you
status_new_desc: Your request has been received, please wait for a while.
user_not_found: User not found, please create account first
logout_desc: Do you really want to log out?
bank_address: 744013, Turkmenistan, Ashgabat, st. Hero of Turkmenistan Atamyrat Niyazov, 154
info_2: 50% from salary of borrower and guarantor to repay the loan and interest on it (or 50% from total family income)
